column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I visited the Art Institute with my husband and our friend Tristan C.
column2: a Chicago local. We went on a Thursday at 5
column3: when admission was free for residents. There was a long line to get in
column4: but it went quickly. We only had about an hour and a half before dinner
column5: so we went through the special exhibit and then a lightning tour of the greatest hits
